nodes.text: Happy Landing was the main cantina of the Tazan starport, on the planet Tazan.

Happy Landing was two stories high and was situated just outside the Tazan starport's main gate. Inside, the cantina had many small rooms and it also had a balcony that offered panoramic views of Tazan City. The cantina's clientele consisted primarily of Human locals and spacers of various species.

During the Galactic Civil War, Happy Landing was owned and operated by the Human fringer Lex Dewiller. Sometime after the destruction of the planet Alderaan, a team of Rebel Alliance agents traveled to Tazan and visited Happy Landing.
